headline: A Twitchy Market Is Punishing Stocks for the Slightest Earnings Dings
summary: Both chip maker Texas Instruments and HVAC provider Carrier have seen their shares tumble after beating earnings and revenue estimates.

headline: Carrier Global (CARR) Declines 10.6% on Earnings Drop
summary: We recently published Massive Drop Alert: These 10 Stocks Take a Beating. Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE:CARR) is one of the worst-performing stocks on Tuesday. Carrier Global declined by 10.61 percent on Tuesday to close at $71.67 apiece as investors soured on the company’s dismal earnings performance in the second quarter of the year.
